solution_line_template: The total speed of all five coasters is {total_speed_all_coasters} because {average_speed} x {num_coasters} = <<{total_speed_all_coasters}={total_speed_all_coasters}>>{total_speed_all_coasters}

The final coaster went {speed_coaster5} miles per hour because {total_speed_all_coasters} - {speed_coaster1} - {speed_coaster2} - {speed_coaster3} - {speed_coaster4} = <<{total_speed_all_coasters}-{speed_coaster1}-{speed_coaster2}-{speed_coaster3}-{speed_coaster4}={speed_coaster5}>>{speed_coaster5}
